title: Drawing, "Project for the elevation of a metal baptismal bowl", ca. 1928
medium: Pencil, colored crayon; blue, yellow, red watercolor; gray cardboard
inscribed: Written bottom right: FONT NATURAL SIZE / GEORGE E.GERMER , DES.
description: In the shape of a baptismal font with a cover; a shell is on top. Diamonds form crosses which alternate with shields in the panels of the parapet. The shields represent: A[p with descender bisecting an X; Greek letter omega]; a rose, a fleur-de-lys; [an anchor with a heart]. Those not visible in the decoration are shown beside it. More diamonds at the molding. Verso: incised corner ornament. [See accession ledger for illustrations.]

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Project for the elevation of a metal baptismal bowl", ca. 1928.Pencil, colored crayon; blue, yellow, red watercolor; gray cardboard. 1939-84-61-a.
